title: Musonius Rufus Stoic Fragments: PT 1
description:
This episode comes out for free on 10/23/22.

Today‚Äôs episode features two sections from the lesser known Musonius Rufus Stoic Fragments: That Man Is Born With An Inclination Toward Virtue and That Women Too Should Study Philosophy. Pick up a copy of That One Should Disdain Hardships: The Teachings of a Roman Stoic by Musonius Rufus at the Painted Porch Bookshop.
